title: eye spy, (trying to start a game now)
body:
The aim of the game is to have vision all of the buffs, baron, dragon, enemy nexus, all 3 inhibs and fountain, only with no stealth wards and champions with long range teleports. the game ends when one team has vision of all those places at once. 

Something most people don't get is that killing is allowed and each team has to work together to get their vision down and stop the enemy team
